title: To Bot Or Not To Bot
body:
All fun and gun get destroyed in pvp win like an ace vs bot.
So what's do I think of this.
There should be a better setup vs bot to equal the pvp mode so we can really train more than just a champ but train a battle ahead

replies.body:
Its out there with luck you shall find even thow not so exactness yet called habit.
No i know its easier said than done.
but they still don't jungle and well there not AI your wrong on that there hasn't been a AI yet just pai,
programed artificial intelligence
Ok, you figure out how to make an AI good enough to have bots even half as good as the average bronze V player.
